title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Skills: Interactive Theater for Delivering Bad News in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more empathetic responses appropriately in patient-healthcare provider communication scenarios through role-playing.
Learners can analyze their communication style by writing a reflective journal within 15 minutes after viewing an interactive play.
Learners can derive three or more improvement points for delivering bad news based on peer evaluation and expert feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
